N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 34.2 - Relationship to federal law

State Regulations
(a) The availability and disclosure
provisions of this Part are inapplicable to transaction accounts except as
provided in section
34.4
(c) of this

Part. (b) Any bank of savings
institution may elect to comply with the availability and disclosure provisions
of regulation CC of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System with
respect to any type or category of non-transaction account (i.e., account as
defined in section
34.3
[a]
of this

Part). Compliance with the provisions of regulation CC shall be deemed to be in
compliance with the availability and disclosure provisions of this Part. (References to regulation CC are to
12 CFR
[FN*] part 229 entitled "Availability
of Funds and Collection of Checks".)
[FN*] For information regarding the United States Code (USC
or U.S.C.), the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) and the Federal Register, see

Supervisory Policy G 1. Notes
